name: Fireshare
short_description: Self-hosted video sharing platform with seamless streaming and organization.
description: Self-hosted video sharing platform with seamless streaming and organization. Fireshare is a self-hosted application focused on media, file-sharing, streaming, video. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Fireshare on your home server to self-hosted video sharing platform with seamless streaming and organization without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Fireshare to manage your media workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
